module.name: files

desc.p:
This module contains basic filesystem types and interfaces. This includes:
The concept of different file types including basic files, mount points, tmp files, etc.
Access to groups of files and all files.
Types and interfaces for the basic filesystem layout (/, /etc, /tmp, /usr, etc.).

module.required: Contains the concept of a file. Comains the file initial SID.

interface.name: files_type
interface.summary: Make the specified type usable for files in a filesystem.

param.name: type
param.summary: Type to be used for files.

interface.name: files_lock_file
interface.summary: Make the specified type usable for lock files.

param.name: type
param.summary: Type to be used for lock files.

interface.name: files_mountpoint
interface.summary: Make the specified type usable for filesystem mount points.

param.name: type
param.summary: Type to be used for mount points.

interface.name: files_pid_file
interface.summary: Make the specified type usable for runtime process ID files.

param.name: type
param.summary: Type to be used for PID files.

interface.name: files_config_file
interface.summary: Make the specified type a configuration file.

param.name: file_type
param.summary: Type to be used as a configuration file.

interface.name: files_poly
interface.summary: Make the specified type a polyinstantiated directory.

param.name: file_type
param.summary: Type of the file to be used as a polyinstantiated directory.

interface.name: files_poly_parent
interface.summary: Make the specified type a parent of a polyinstantiated directory.

param.name: file_type
param.summary: Type of the file to be used as a parent directory.

interface.name: files_poly_member
interface.summary: Make the specified type a polyinstantiation member directory.

param.name: file_type
param.summary: Type of the file to be used as a member directory.

interface.name: files_poly_member_tmp
interface.summary: Make the domain use the specified type of polyinstantiated directory.

param.name: file_type
param.summary: Type of the file to be used as a member directory.

interface.name: files_security_file
interface.summary: Make the specified type a file that should not be dontaudited from browsing from user domains.

param.name: file_type
param.summary: Type of the file to be used as a member directory.

interface.name: files_tmp_file
interface.summary: Make the specified type a file used for temporary files.

param.name: file_type
param.summary: Type of the file to be used as a temporary file.

interface.name: files_tmpfs_file
interface.summary: Transform the type into a file, for use on a virtual memory filesystem (tmpfs).

interface.name: files_getattr_all_dirs
interface.summary: Get the attributes of all directories.

interface.name: files_dontaudit_getattr_all_dirs
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to get the attributes of all directories.

interface.name: files_list_non_security
interface.summary: List all non-security directories.

interface.name: files_dontaudit_list_non_security
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to list all non-security directories.

interface.name: files_mounton_non_security
interface.summary: Mount a filesystem on all non-security directories and files.

interface.name: files_write_non_security_dirs
interface.summary: Allow attempts to modify any directory

interface.name: files_getattr_all_files
interface.summary: Get the attributes of all files.

interface.name: files_dontaudit_getattr_all_files
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to get the attributes of all files.

interface.name: files_dontaudit_getattr_non_security_files
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to get the attributes of non security files.

interface.name: files_read_all_files
interface.summary: Read all files.

interface.name: files_execmod_all_files
interface.summary: Allow shared library text relocations in all files.

desc.p: Allow shared library text relocations in all files.
This is added to support WINE in the targeted policy. It has no effect on the strict policy.

interface.name: files_read_non_security_files
interface.summary: Read all non-security files.

interface.name: files_read_all_dirs_except
interface.summary: Read all directories on the filesystem, except the listed exceptions.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the domain perfoming this action.

param.name: exception_types
param.summary: The types to be excluded. Each type or attribute must be negated by the caller.

interface.name: files_read_all_files_except
interface.summary: Read all files on the filesystem, except the listed exceptions.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the domain perfoming this action.

param.name: exception_types
param.summary: The types to be excluded. Each type or attribute must be negated by the caller.

interface.name: files_read_all_symlinks_except
interface.summary: Read all symbolic links on the filesystem, except the listed exceptions.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the domain perfoming this action.

param.name: exception_types
param.summary: The types to be excluded. Each type or attribute must be negated by the caller.

interface.name: files_dontaudit_getattr_all_symlinks
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to get the attributes of all symbolic links.

interface.name: files_dontaudit_read_all_symlinks
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read all symbolic links.

interface.name: files_dontaudit_getattr_non_security_symlinks
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to get the attributes of non security symbolic links.

interface.name: files_dontaudit_getattr_non_security_blk_files
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to get the attributes of non security block devices.

interface.name: files_dontaudit_getattr_non_security_chr_files
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to get the attributes of non security character devices.

interface.name: files_read_all_symlinks
interface.summary: Read all symbolic links.

interface.name: files_getattr_all_pipes
interface.summary: Get the attributes of all named pipes.

interface.name: files_dontaudit_getattr_all_pipes
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to get the attributes of all named pipes.

interface.name: files_dontaudit_getattr_non_security_pipes
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to get the attributes of non security named pipes.

interface.name: files_getattr_all_sockets
interface.summary: Get the attributes of all named sockets.

interface.name: files_dontaudit_getattr_all_sockets
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to get the attributes of all named sockets.

interface.name: files_dontaudit_getattr_non_security_sockets
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to get the attributes of non security named sockets.

interface.name: files_read_all_blk_files
interface.summary: Read all block nodes with file types.

interface.name: files_read_all_chr_files
interface.summary: Read all character nodes with file types.

interface.name: files_relabel_all_files
interface.summary: Relabel all files on the filesystem, except the listed exceptions.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the domain perfoming this action.

param.name: exception_types
param.summary: The types to be excluded. Each type or attribute must be negated by the caller.

interface.name: files_manage_all_files
interface.summary: Manage all files on the filesystem, except the listed exceptions.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the domain perfoming this action.

param.name: exception_types
param.summary: The types to be excluded. Each type or attribute must be negated by the caller.

interface.name: files_search_all
interface.summary: Search the contents of all directories on extended attribute filesystems.

interface.name: files_list_all
interface.summary: List the contents of all directories on extended attribute filesystems.

interface.name: files_dontaudit_search_all_dirs
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to search the contents of any directories on extended attribute filesystems.

interface.name: files_getattr_all_file_type_fs
interface.summary: Get the attributes of all filesystems with the type of a file.

interface.name: files_relabelto_all_file_type_fs
interface.summary: Relabel a filesystem to the type of a file.

interface.name: files_mount_all_file_type_fs

interface.summary: Mount a filesystem on all mount points.

interface.name: files_getattr_all_mountpoints
interface.summary: Get the attributes of all mount points.

interface.name: files_list_root
interface.summary: List the contents of the root directory.

interface.summary: Create an object in the root directory, with a private type using a type transition.

param.name: private type
param.summary: The type of the object to be created.

param.name: object
param.summary: The object class of the object being created.

interface.name: files_dontaudit_read_root_files
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read files in the root directory.

interface.name: files_dontaudit_rw_root_files
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read or write files in the root directory.

interface.name: files_dontaudit_rw_root_chr_files
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read or write character device nodes in the root directory.

interface.name: files_delete_root_dir_entry
interface.summary: Remove entries from the root directory.

interface.name: files_unmount_rootfs
interface.summary: Unmount a rootfs filesystem.

param.name: private_type
param.summary: The type of the object to be created.

param.name: object_class
param.summary: The object class of the object being created.

interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete files in the /boot directory.

interface.name: files_create_kernel_img
interface.summary: Install a kernel into the /boot directory.

interface.name: files_delete_kernel
interface.summary: Delete a kernel from /boot.

desc.p: Create a boot flag, such as /.autorelabel and /.autofsck.

param.name: object
param.summary: The class of the object being created.

interface.name: files_manage_isid_type_files
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete files on new filesystems that have not yet been labeled.

interface.name: files_manage_isid_type_symlinks

param.summary: The type of the object to be created.

param.summary: The object class of the object being created.

param.summary: Type of the file to associate.

param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.summary: Read symbolic links in the tmp directory (/tmp).

interface.name: files_rw_generic_tmp_sockets

param.summary: The object class of the object being created.

interface.name: files_search_spool
interface.summary: Search the contents of generic spool directories (/var/spool).

interface.name: files_dontaudit_search_spool
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to search generic spool directories.

interface.name: files_list_spool
interface.summary: List the contents of generic spool (/var/spool) directories.

interface.name: files_manage_generic_spool_dirs
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete generic spool directories (/var/spool).

interface.name: files_read_generic_spool
interface.summary: Read generic spool files.

interface.name: files_manage_generic_spool
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete generic spool files.

interface.name: files_spool_filetrans
interface.summary: Create objects in the spool directory with a private type with a type transition.

interface.name: files_polyinstantiate_all
interface.summary: Allow access to manage all polyinstantiated directories on the system.

interface.name: files_unconfined
interface.summary: Unconfined access to files.

interface.name: files_manage_non_security_dirs
interface.summary: Allow attempts to monage any directory
